original_text: Shalmaneser king of Assyria came up to attack Hoshea, who had been Shalmaneser’s vassal and had paid him tribute.
korean_text: 앗수르의 왕 살만에셀이 올라오니 호세아가 그에게 종이 되어 조공을 드리더니

sentences.original_text: Shalmaneser king of Assyria came up to attack Hoshea
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 왕 살마네셀이 호세아를 공격하러 올라왔으며
